019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
022import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
023import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
024import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_VERSION;
025import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
026import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
027import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
028
029/**
030 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
031 */
032public class Reconciler extends Component {
033
034    /**
035     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
036     *
037     * @param componentChannel the component channel
038     */
039    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
040        super(componentChannel);
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * Handles the change event.
045     *
046     * @param event the event
047     * @param channel the channel
048     * @throws ApiException the api exception
049     */
050    @Handler
051    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
052            throws ApiException {
053        DynamicKubernetesApi vmDefApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
054            VM_OP_VERSION, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
055        var defMeta = event.metadata();
056        var vmDef = vmDefApi.get(defMeta.getNamespace(), defMeta.getName());
057
058//        DynamicKubernetesApi cmApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
059//            "configmaps", channel.client());
060//        var cm = new DynamicKubernetesObject();
061//        cm.setApiVersion("v1");
062//        cm.setKind("ConfigMap");
063//        V1ObjectMeta metadata = new V1ObjectMeta();
064//        metadata.setNamespace("default");
065//        metadata.setName("test");
066//        cm.setMetadata(metadata);
067//        JsonObject data = new JsonObject();
068//        data.addProperty("test", "value");
069//        cm.getRaw().add("data", data);
070//
071//        var response = cmApi.create("default", cm, new CreateOptions())
072//            .throwsApiException();
073
074//        var obj = channel.coa().getNamespacedCustomObject(VM_OP_GROUP, VM_OP_VERSION,
075//            md.getNamespace(), event.crd().getName(), md.getName());
076        event = null;
077
078    }
079
080}
